#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define INFI 100000000000000LL
using namespace std;

const int INF = 2000000000;

struct Edge {
  int from, to, cap, flow, index;
  Edge(int from, int to, int cap, int flow, int index) :
    from(from), to(to), cap(cap), flow(flow), index(index) {}
};

struct Dinic {
  int N;
  vector<vector<Edge> > G;
  vector<Edge *> dad;
  vector<int> Q;

  Dinic(int N) : N(N), G(N), dad(N), Q(N) {}

  void AddEdge(int from, int to, int cap) {
    G[from].push_back(Edge(from, to, cap, 0, G[to].size()));
    if (from == to) G[from].back().index++;
    G[to].push_back(Edge(to, from, 0, 0, G[from].size() - 1));
  }

  long long BlockingFlow(int s, int t) {
    fill(dad.begin(), dad.end(), (Edge *) NULL);
    dad[s] = &G[0][0] - 1;

    int head = 0, tail = 0;
    Q[tail++] = s;
    while (head < tail) {
      int x = Q[head++];
      for (int i = 0; i < G[x].size(); i++) {
	Edge &e = G[x][i];
	if (!dad[e.to] && e.cap - e.flow > 0) {
	  dad[e.to] = &G[x][i];
	  Q[tail++] = e.to;
	}
      }
    }
    if (!dad[t]) return 0;

    long long totflow = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < G[t].size(); i++) {
      Edge *start = &G[G[t][i].to][G[t][i].index];
      int amt = INF;
      for (Edge *e = start; amt && e != dad[s]; e = dad[e->from]) {
	if (!e) { amt = 0; break; }
	amt = min(amt, e->cap - e->flow);
      }
      if (amt == 0) continue;
      for (Edge *e = start; amt && e != dad[s]; e = dad[e->from]) {
	e->flow += amt;
	G[e->to][e->index].flow -= amt;
      }
      totflow += amt;
    }
    return totflow;
  }

  long long GetMaxFlow(int s, int t) {
    long long totflow = 0;
    while (long long flow = BlockingFlow(s, t))
      totflow += flow;
    return totflow;
  }
};
int n, m, k;
long long duration[101][101];
long long solve(long long time)
{
    Dinic graph(n+m+2);
    for(int i = 0; i<n; i++)
    {
        graph.AddEdge(0, i+1, 1);
        for(int j = 0; j<m; j++)
        {
            if(duration[i][j]<=time)
                graph.AddEdge(i+1, n+j+1, 1);
        }
    }
    for(int i = 0; i<m; i++)
        graph.AddEdge(1+n+i, n+m+1, 1);
    return graph.GetMaxFlow(0, n+m+1);
}
int main()
{
    scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &k);

    for(int i = 0; i<n; i++)
        for(int j = 0; j<m; j++)
            scanf("%lld", &duration[i][j]);

    long long ans = INFI;
    long long st = 0, mid, en = INFI;

    while(st<en)
    {
        mid = (st+en)>>1;
        long long mxflow = solve(mid);

        if(mxflow>=k)
        {
            if(ans>mid)
                ans = mid;
            en = mid;
        }
        else
            st = mid+1;
    }
    printf("%lld\n", ans);
}
